! all lengths and dimensions in cm
! scales are relative to default font height hei=0.3633 cm

graphWidth = 13
graphHeight = graphWidth/ratio

titleDist = 0.2
titleScale = 1
axisLabelDist = 0.15
axisLabelScale = 1
axisTitleDist = titleDist
axisTitleScale = 1

axisWidth = 0.04
lineWidth = 0.03
markerSize = 0.2

keyHei = 0.3
keyDist = 0.1
keyMargins = 0.12
keyLineLength = 0.4
keyColDist = 0.4
